Question Number: --
Variable Label: respno
Question Text: respondent number
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: --
Variable Label: PSU
Question Text: primary sampling unit
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: --
Variable Label: hhold
Question Text: how many members are there in your household
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: --
Variable Label: children
Question Text: among these members, how many children are there below 18 years of age
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: --
Variable Label: date
Question Text: date of interview
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: --
Variable Label: Sex of Respondent
Question Text: what is the respondent’s gender
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 1
Variable Label: Age
Question Text: how old were you at your last birthday
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Variable Label: Nigerian language
Question Text: which [country]n language do you speak most often

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 6A
Variable Label: Church assoc.
Question Text: now i am going to read out a list of voluntary organizations.  for each one, could you tell me whether you are an active member, an inactive member, or not a member of that organization?:  a. church, mosque, or religious organization
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Variable Label: Meaning of democracy

Question Number: 33A
Variable Label: Majority Rules
Question Text: people associate democracy with many different meanings such as the ones that i will mention now.  in order for a society to be called democratic, how important is each of these.  a.  the majority rules
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 33B
Variable Label: Free to criticize
Question Text: people associate democracy with many different meanings such as the ones that i will mention now.  in order for a society to be called democratic, how important is each of these.  b. anyone is free to criticize the government
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Variable Label: Regular elections

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 33D
Variable Label: Parties compete

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 36
Variable Label: Support for democracy
Question Text: which of the following statements is closest to your own opinion? a.  democracy is preferable to any other form of government b.  in certain situations, a non-democratic government can be preferable. c.  to people like me, it doesn’t matter what form of government we have
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 37
Variable Label: Allow expression?
Question Text: a.  it is dangerous and confusing to allow the expression of too many different points of view.  b.  if people have different views than i do, they should be allowed to express them
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 38
Variable Label: Permitted to vote?
Question Text: a.  all people should be permitted to vote, even if they do not fully understand all the issues in an election.  b.  only those who are sufficiently well educated should be allowed to vote
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 41
Variable Label: Best form of government?       8
Question Text: a.  the best form of government is a government elected by the people.  b.  the best form of government is a government that gets things done

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 42A
Variable Label: Elections and parties
Question Text: we are now going to discuss how much you like different kinds of government  i would like you to give marks out of ten. let us say that the best government gets 10 out of 10 and the worst kind of government gets only 1 out of 10.  what mark would you give to:  a.  our present system of government with free elections and many parties
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 42B
Variable Label: Military rule
Question Text: we are now going to discuss how much you like different kinds of government  i would like you to give marks out of ten. let us say that the best government gets 10 out of 10 and the worst kind of government gets only 1 out of 10.  what mark would you give to:  b.  the former system of military rule
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 42C
Variable Label: Colonial system
Question Text: we are now going to discuss how much you like different kinds of government  i would like you to give marks out of ten. let us say that the best government gets 10 out of 10 and the worst kind of government gets only 1 out of 10.  what mark would you give to:  c.  the former colonial system (that is, when the british ruled)
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 42D
Variable Label: Traditional system
Question Text: we are now going to discuss how much you like different kinds of government  i would like you to give marks out of ten. let us say that the best government gets 10 out of 10 and the worst kind of government gets only 1 out of 10.  what mark would you give to:  d.  the old system of government by traditional rulers
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 42E
Variable Label: Future system

    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Variable Label: Free to say

    Question Text: ''

Variable Label: Free to choose

    Variable Label: ''

Variable Label: Treated equally

    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 43F
Variable Label: Adequate living standard

    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 44A
Variable Label: Strong leader
Question Text: “some people say that we would be better off if the country was governed differently.  what do you think about the following options?”  a.  we should get rid of elections so that a strong leader can decide everything
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 44B
Variable Label: One political party
Question Text: “some people say that we would be better off if the country was governed differently.  what do you think about the following options?”  b.  we should have only one political party
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 44C
Variable Label: Army come in
Question Text: “some people say that we would be better off if the country was governed differently.  what do you think about the following options?”  c.  the army should come in to govern the country
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 44D
Variable Label: Government by experts
Question Text: “some people say that we would be better off if the country was governed differently.  what do you think about the following options?”  d.  the most important decisions, for example on the economy, should be left to experts
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Variable Label: Satisfaction with democracy
Question Text: overall, how satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the way democracy works in [country]
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 46
Variable Label: Deal with inherited problems?
Question Text: a.  our present system of elected government should be able to deal with inherited problems, even if this takes time.  b.  if democracy can’t produce results soon, we should try another form of government
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 47A
Variable Label: Economic runs badly
Question Text: i am going to read out some things that people sometimes say about a democratic political system.  could you please tell me if you agree or disagree after i read out each one?  a.  in a democracy, the economic system runs badly
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 47B
Variable Label: Indecisive squabbling
Question Text: i am going to read out some things that people sometimes say about a democratic political system.  could you please tell me if you agree or disagree after i read out each one?  b.  democracies are indecisive and have too much squabbling
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 47C
Variable Label: Maintaining order
Question Text: i am going to read out some things that people sometimes say about a democratic political system.  could you please tell me if you agree or disagree after i read out each one?  c.  democracies aren’t good at maintaining order
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 47D
Variable Label: Problems, but better?
Question Text: i am going to read out some things that people sometimes say about a democratic political system.  could you please tell me if you agree or disagree after i read out each one?  d.  democracy may have problems, but its better than any other form of government
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Variable Label: Trust generally
